Class ParameterConstructor

java.lang.Object
constructors.ParameterConstructor
public class ParameterConstructor extends Object
Class for reading parameters of fields from input.

This class uses generics to read different types of data

Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • readParameter

      public <T> T readParameter(BuildingRequest<T> buildingRequest) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException, ExitWritten, DateTimeParseException
      Tries to read parameter from input until it read successfully.

      If exit is written, terminates program. Stops a loop if parameter was read, and it satisfies constraints if there are such in parameter

      Returns:
      parameter read from input
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException
      IllegalStateException
      IllegalArgumentException
      ExitWritten
      DateTimeParseException
